Label: STEREO Behind IMPACT/MAG Burst Mode (~0.03 sec) Magnetic Field Vectors - J. Luhmann (UCB/SSL)

DatasetLink.Title: STEREO/IMPACT PI Site
DatasetLink.Text: Experiment and Data descriptions for STEREO/IMPACT

VariableDescription.Name: BFIELD
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Magnetic field vector in RTN coordinates from the IMPACT/MAG instrument.
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         STP>Solar Terrestrial Probes
#     SOURCE_NAME                     Behind>Solar Terrestrial Relations Observatory . of the Sun-Earth Line
#     DISCIPLINE                      Solar Physics>Heliospheric Physics
#     DATA_TYPE                       L1>Level 1
#     DESCRIPTOR                      IMPACT_MAG>In-situ Measurements of Particles and CME Transients_Magnetometer
#     DATA_VERSION                    6
#     PI_NAME                         J. Luhmann
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  UCB/SSL
#     TEXT                            The file contains Level 1 magnetic field vectors from the IMPACT/MAG instrument                        
#                                      on the STEREO Behind spacecraft.                                                                      
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Magnetic Fields (space)
#     MISSION_GROUP                   STEREO
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  stb_l1_magb_rtn
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 stb_l1_magb_rtn_00000000_v01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      STEREO Behind IMPACT/MAG Burst Mode (~0.03 sec) Magnetic Field Vectors
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 00:00:00.031
#     GENERATED_BY                    stereo2cdf
#     GENERATION_DATE                 2011 178 JUN 27 09:08:08.928
#     MODS                            Version 1: Used internally at UCB and UCLA ONLY. No corrections applied to raw                         
#     MODS                             MAG data. Version 2: Offset correction applied to MAG data. Version 3: Initial                        
#     MODS                             algorithm for correcting glitches in the X sensor on STEREO Ahead applied.                            
#     MODS                             Version 4: Improvement in glitch correction algorithm applied. Version 5: Further                     
#     MODS                             refinement of glitch correction for X sensor on STEREO Ahead. Also, two timing                        
#     MODS                             issues resolved: a) applying a 6ms time shift to account for time lag between                         
#     MODS                             IMPACT IDPU and MAG, b) fixing an occasional 1 second "glitch". Version 6:                            
#                                      Added "FILTER_VALUE" variable                                                                         
#     LINK_TEXT                       Experiment and Data descriptions for STEREO/IMPACT
#     LINK_TITLE                      STEREO/IMPACT PI Site
#     HTTP_LINK                       http://sprg.ssl.berkeley.edu/impact
#     FILE_NAMING_CONVENTION          source_datatype_descriptor
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time since 0 AD
#       NOTES:  Interval-centered time tag
#  2. Magnetic field vector in RTN coordinates from the IMPACT/MAG instrument.
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 17:36:58 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#
EPOCH                                       BR                     BT                     BZ                 BTOTAL
                                       (@_BR_)                (@_BT_)                (@_Bz_)            (@_BTotal_)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms                      nT                     nT                     nT                     nT
07-11-2006 00:58:50.943               -2.45994               0.184637               0.270657                2.48167

VariableDescription.Name: MAGFLAGUC
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         STP>Solar Terrestrial Probes
#     SOURCE_NAME                     Behind>Solar Terrestrial Relations Observatory . of the Sun-Earth Line
#     DISCIPLINE                      Solar Physics>Heliospheric Physics
#     DATA_TYPE                       L1>Level 1
#     DESCRIPTOR                      IMPACT_MAG>In-situ Measurements of Particles and CME Transients_Magnetometer
#     DATA_VERSION                    6
#     PI_NAME                         J. Luhmann
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  UCB/SSL
#     TEXT                            The file contains Level 1 magnetic field vectors from the IMPACT/MAG instrument                        
#                                      on the STEREO Behind spacecraft.                                                                      
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Magnetic Fields (space)
#     MISSION_GROUP                   STEREO
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  stb_l1_magb_rtn
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 stb_l1_magb_rtn_00000000_v01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      STEREO Behind IMPACT/MAG Burst Mode (~0.03 sec) Magnetic Field Vectors
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 00:00:00.031
#     GENERATED_BY                    stereo2cdf
#     GENERATION_DATE                 2011 178 JUN 27 09:08:08.928
#     MODS                            Version 1: Used internally at UCB and UCLA ONLY. No corrections applied to raw                         
#     MODS                             MAG data. Version 2: Offset correction applied to MAG data. Version 3: Initial                        
#     MODS                             algorithm for correcting glitches in the X sensor on STEREO Ahead applied.                            
#     MODS                             Version 4: Improvement in glitch correction algorithm applied. Version 5: Further                     
#     MODS                             refinement of glitch correction for X sensor on STEREO Ahead. Also, two timing                        
#     MODS                             issues resolved: a) applying a 6ms time shift to account for time lag between                         
#     MODS                             IMPACT IDPU and MAG, b) fixing an occasional 1 second "glitch". Version 6:                            
#                                      Added "FILTER_VALUE" variable                                                                         
#     LINK_TEXT                       Experiment and Data descriptions for STEREO/IMPACT
#     LINK_TITLE                      STEREO/IMPACT PI Site
#     HTTP_LINK                       http://sprg.ssl.berkeley.edu/impact
#     FILE_NAMING_CONVENTION          source_datatype_descriptor
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time since 0 AD
#       NOTES:  Interval-centered time tag
#  2. [HIGHLY ENCODED VALUES] IMPACT/MAG status flag
#       NOTES:  bit 0:3 Mag Error counter.     bit 4:7 Mag Command counter.     bit 8   spare.     bit 9   First.     bit 10  Time.     bit 11  Interface Parity Error (0=OK, 1=Fault).     bit 12  Interface Timeout Error (0=OK, 1=Fault).     bit 13  ADC Cal (0=OFF, 1=ON).     bit 14  In Flight Cal (0=OFF, 1=ON).     bit 15  Range (0=low fields, high sensitivity, 1=high fields, low sen.     bit 16  Calibration (0=old cal, 1=new cal).     bit 17  STEREO STEPPING For X-axis.     bit 18:31 spare
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 17:36:59 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  bit 0:3 Mag Error counter.     bit 4:7 Mag Command counter.     bit 8   spare.     bit 9   First.     bit 10  Time.     bit 11  Interface Parity Error (0=OK, 1=Fault).     bit 12  Interface Timeout Error (0=OK, 1=Fault).     bit 13  ADC Cal (0=OFF, 1=ON).     bit 14  In Flight Cal (0=OFF, 1=ON).     bit 15  Range (0=low fields, high sensitivity, 1=high fields, low sen.     bit 16  Calibration (0=old cal, 1=new cal).     bit 17  STEREO STEPPING For X-axis.     bit 18:31 spare
#
EPOCH                   MAGFLAGUC
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms           
07-11-2006 00:58:50.943    131360
